story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful city of Baghdad, there lived a young girl named Leila. Leila was a kind and brave girl who loved exploring the markets and listening to the stories of the wise old storytellers.

One night, as the stars twinkled brightly in the sky, Leila's mother tucked her into bed and began to tell her a bedtime story.

"Once upon a time, in a faraway land, there was a magical garden filled with the most colorful flowers and sweetest scents you could ever imagine," her mother began.

Leila's eyes grew wide with wonder as her mother described the garden in vivid detail. She could almost smell the fragrant roses and hear the soft murmur of the nearby stream.

"In this garden, there was a special tree that was said to grant wishes to those who were pure of heart and kind of spirit," her mother continued.

Leila listened intently as her mother spun a tale of adventure and wonder, of friendships forged and dreams fulfilled. She drifted off to sleep with visions of the magical garden dancing in her mind, feeling grateful for the love and warmth of her family.

And as the night grew quiet and the moon shone brightly through the window, Leila dreamt of a world where anything was possible, where kindness and bravery were the greatest treasures of all.

The end. Goodnight, sweet Leila. May your dreams be filled with joy and magic.
